error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Parameter $path_alias_manager of method Drupal\custom_header_image\Plugin\Block\HeaderImageBlock::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Path\AliasManager. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\path_alias\AliasManager instead.
Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.
Call to deprecated method strtolower() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strtolower() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to custom_header_image.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
